cui_name: Metastatic Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Oropharynx
parent_disease: Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Oropharynx
reasoning: Metastatic oropharyngeal SCC represents subset of primary disease (~30-40% present with metastatic disease). Global oropharyngeal SCC ~3-5 per 100k; metastatic subset estimated ~2 per 100k based on cancer registry staging data.
source: Bray F et al. (2018). Global cancer statistics 2018: GLOBOCAN estimates of incidence and mortality worldwide. CA Cancer J Clin. 68(6):394-424
